query.value:
with vw_max as
(
select max(code) as max_code from cd_ods.tb_sf_mdm_school_real_address_t
)
 select "코드" as code, replace("주소[ADDR1]", ' ', '') as addr
  FROM cd_ods.tb_mdm_school_info a 
  left join cd_ods.tb_sf_mdm_school_real_address_t b
  on a."코드" = b.code
  where coalesce (a."주소[ADDR1]",'') != ''
  and coalesce (b.address,'') = ''
--  and a."코드" > (select max_code from vw_max)
 order by code

source.query:
WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2
UNION ALL
SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '2' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 5

query.value:
select no, registration_num, store_id, store_name, after_addr as brand_store_address_full
from (
select a.no, a.clos_ym,  a.registration_num, a.store_id, a.store_name, a.brand_store_address_full,
regexp_replace(split_part( split_part( brand_store_address_full,',',1),'(',1), '(^|\s)(\S+)\s+\2', '\1\2', 'g') AS after_addr,
b.sido, b.sigungu, b.dong 
from cd_ods.tb_fc_brandstores_navermap_t a 
left join cd_ods.tb_fc_brandstores_real_address_t b
on a.store_id  = b.store_id 
and a.registration_num  = b.registration_num 
)
where clos_ym = (select max(clos_ym) as max_ym from cd_ods.tb_fc_brandstores_navermap_t)
and coalesce (sido, '') = ''
order by no
limit 5000

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE FROM cd_ods.tb_nielsen_data
WHERE PER_TAG BETWEEN '@{variables('minWeek')}' AND '@{variables('maxWeek')}'

DELETE FROM cd_ods.tb_nielsen_per
WHERE TAG BETWEEN '@{variables('minWeek')}' AND '@{variables('maxWeek')}'

query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt_temp where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt
(
     tag 
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag 
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name 
	,if_date
    ,ifyyyymm 
)
select   tag 
		,short 
		,long 
		,display_order
		,parent_tag 
		,hier_num 
		,hier_name
		,hier_level_num 
		,hier_level_name 
		,if_date
	    ,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' if_yyyymm 
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt_temp;


delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod
(
    tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,ifyyyymm
)
select  tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
 where  ifyyyymm = '@{variables('yyyymm')}';

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
(
    tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,ifyyyymm
)
select  tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

query.value:
select srd_id
    ,sd_reviewid
    ,site
    ,site_id
    ,srd_title
    ,srd_content
    ,srd_writer
    ,srd_writetime
    ,srd_rate
    ,srd_crawl_time
      from  cd_ods.tb_rsn_market_full 
     where rnum between 1 + ( 1000000 * ( @{item().page} -1 ) )  and 1000000 * @{item().page}
